Message.Title: Why can't I buy anything on ebay?
Message.Msg: Due to new "security" I am not able to log onto my account. When I call the help line in the Philippines (shhhhh! they don't want you to know they out sourced those jobs!!) ... they are able to allow me to access my account. Then when I log out I get to repeat the whole process again. Looks like I will take my business else where ebay!

Topic.Title: Ebay's Milo hurts patents of Local Corp

Message.Msg: Krillion Licensed to Gannett – In conjunction with the Rovion sale, Gannett will license the Krillion technology from the company. Krillion’s real time shopping inventory data has been integrated into the Rovion rich media ad platform, providing Gannett’s customers with access to real time shopping data. Source: Q3/2012-report of Local Corp
